duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deliver educational programs for diverse audiences, including K-12 students, educators, young families, young professionals, and adults.
Manage and maintain programming and education budgets.
Cultivate collaborations with local schools, youth-focused organizations, and community groups.
Develop engaging educational resources for local schools' curricula and Ohio Learning Standards.
Promote educational programming through social media, print, and digital platforms.
Identify and secure sponsorships for educational programs and outreach events.
Coordinate and schedule in-person and virtual volunteer opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Education, History, or Museum Studies (Master’s preferred)
